general.title: Coriolis Force Demonstration - title enhanced by cataloger
general.description: This short video clip provides a real life example of the coriolis force. It is a movie of a ball rolling across the surface of a rotating merry-go-round. As the ball is passed from one person to another, the path of the ball appears to curve, however when viewed from above, the path is appears straight, exemplifying the effect the rotation of the Earth.
